q: the legendary heavyweight champion Mohammed Ali and Secretary of State Colin Powell . Tony first showed an interest in becoming a broadcast journalist at the tender age of 5. His mother remembers him watching the news and saying This is Tony Smith with the 6 o'clock news. Tony was born in Chicago and is a graduate of Barry University in Miami. Tony spends his free time watching movies, enjoying the great outdoors and swimming. He lives in the Aksarben Village area.
